CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Discount_Level__c , '5 Star') ,IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "5 stars"), IF(ISPICKVAL( Discount_Level__c , '4 Star'),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "4 stars"), IF(ISPICKVAL( Discount_Level__c , '3 Star'),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_300.gif", "3 stars"),IMAGE("/img/samples/stars_000.gif","0 stars"))))
CustomField.label: Platinum Stars
